title: Draconic Bloodline
content: t Disguise up to 4 memebers of your adventuring party. 18m Telekinesis Lv 5 Transmutation ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Throw a creature or object up to 18m with a thought. Once per turn, you can use Telekinesis again without expending a spell slot.Heavier items deal more damage.10 Turns STR Save Concentration Wall of Stone Lv 5 Evocation ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Raise a wall of non-magical, solid stone. 18m Concentration Arcane Gate Lv 6 Conjuration ActionLevel 6 Spell Slot Create two liked teleport
